Try to remember, dickweeds, of how you sound to folks with education above the standard, fourth-grade equivalent of a South Carolina hillbilly highschool diploma.

I can't give you credit for it since this little Brazilian company called TropicalSim made it, but I will give you credit for being one of the few long, long, long-term posters who still has class.

Keep kicking ass.
